de:
On the banks of the River Dordogne 6km south of Sarlat, near some of the region’s most beautiful sights, this house has been in the same family since 1866 and is an ideal spot from which to discover the treasures of the Périgord Noir’s architectural, cultural and gastronomic heritage.
You will receive an unfussy, warm and convivial welcome in the purest Périgourdine tradition. As befits somewhere in the midst of the Périgord’s 1,001 châteaux, we will always be happy to offer advice and recommendations about the area, throughout your stay with us.
We will also be glad to welcome you in our restaurant, its cuisine allying tradition and modernity - with meals served on the terrace in warm weather, in the shade of our luxuriant vine-arbour.
en:
On the banks of the River Dordogne 6km south of Sarlat, near some of the region’s most beautiful sights, this house has been in the same family since 1866 and is an ideal spot from which to discover the treasures of the Périgord Noir’s architectural, cultural and gastronomic heritage.
You will receive an unfussy, warm and convivial welcome in the purest Périgourdine tradition. As befits somewhere in the midst of the Périgord’s 1,001 châteaux, we will always be happy to offer advice and recommendations about the area, throughout your stay with us.
We will also be glad to welcome you in our restaurant, its cuisine allying tradition and modernity - with meals served on the terrace in warm weather, in the shade of our luxuriant vine-arbour.
it:
A metà strada tra Sarlat e Domme, nel cuore del Périgord Noir, vicino ai principali siti e a due passi dalla Dordogna, l'hotel ristorante La Treille offre camere confortevoli e personalizzate con doccia e WC, TV, telefono, aria condizionata e wifi in hotel

Cucina gastronomica e tradizionale, servita d'estate sotto il traliccio ombreggiato o sotto il tetto di vetro. Atmosfera familiare. Chef proprietario (Toques du Périgord e Maître Restaurateur).
fr:
A mi-chemin entre Sarlat et Domme, au cœur du Périgord Noir, à proximité des principaux sites et à deux pas de la Dordogne, l'hôtel restaurant La Treille vous propose ses chambres tout confort et personnalisées avec douche WC, TV, téléphone, climatisation, wifi à l'hôtel. 

Cuisine gastronomique et traditionnelle servie l'été sous la treille ombragée ou sous la verrière. Ambiance familiale. Propriétaire chef de cuisine (Toques du Périgord et Maître Restaurateur).
nl:
On the banks of the River Dordogne 6km south of Sarlat, near some of the region’s most beautiful sights, this house has been in the same family since 1866 and is an ideal spot from which to discover the treasures of the Périgord Noir’s architectural, cultural and gastronomic heritage.
You will receive an unfussy, warm and convivial welcome in the purest Périgourdine tradition. As befits somewhere in the midst of the Périgord’s 1,001 châteaux, we will always be happy to offer advice and recommendations about the area, throughout your stay with us.
We will also be glad to welcome you in our restaurant, its cuisine allying tradition and modernity - with meals served on the terrace in warm weather, in the shade of our luxuriant vine-arbour.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme Sarlat Périgord Noir

de: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.
en: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.

de:
On the banks of the River Dordogne 6km south of Sarlat, near some of the region’s most beautiful sights, this house has been in the same family since 1866 and is an ideal spot from which to discover the treasures of the Périgord Noir’s architectural, cultural and gastronomic heritage.
You will receive an unfussy, warm and convivial welcome in the purest Périgourdine tradition. As befits somewhere in the midst of the Périgord’s 1,001 châteaux, we will always be happy to offer advice and recommendations about the area, throughout your stay with us.
We will also be glad to welcome you in our restaurant, its cuisine allying tradition and modernity - with meals served on the terrace in warm weather, in the shade of our luxuriant vine-arbour.

de: Am Ufer eines Flusses oder eines Stroms
pt: Na borda de um rio ou ribeira
fr: En bord de fleuve ou rivière
nl: Aan de oever van een stroompje of rivier
